shortdesc.ph: Configurations of the last-mile network probe test.

pd.p:
Sets whether or not to test the uplink network. Some users, for example, the audience in a `LIVE_BROADCASTING` channel, do not need such a test:
true: test.
false: do not test.

Sets whether or not to test the downlink network:
true: test.
false: do not test.

plentry.pd: The expected maximum sending bitrate (bps) of the local user. Agora recommends setting the value of this parameter by referring to the bit rate value in.
The expected maximum receiving bitrate (bps) of the local user. The value ranges between 100000 and 5000000.
